website_summaries.verdict: A brace from a trusted brand in bandages that provides lumbar support and can be worn under clothing.
pros: Offers plenty of support and relieves lower back pain
Is good for work, hobby, or athletic activities
cons: Some complaints that the gel insert doesn't stay in place

customer_reviews.title: The two of them don't work together.
customer_reviews.text: its a magic tick to put the pack in the holder and get it on you. You have to lay on it or something or it falls out on to the floor cause it doesn't stay in the holder. As well if you're over 150lbs it's not going to fit you comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZZSatedAhri: Hurt Back+No Abs+ACE = Abs Backed Aceingly
customer_reviews.text: If you are on this page, buy this product. This exceeds expectations in the relief receive for this area and the affected areas supported by this product. This product arrived boxed, only with a single hair and packaging dust on the product in the product display box. Few stitches appear to be loose within a reasonable degree for the most part. This is a day one review. Will longer term use generate issues? Only if there is a chip in the Ace Brand logo stitching and then electrical current forces developmental disruptions! 🧦🌭 👻🧦🐔 🧦👻🥒 ZZSatedAhri
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Torado

customer_reviews.title: Ace is still ACE!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for posture change and I fo find it Best among similar products- spend$$ on other brands- Ace still best for all needs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but has but strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Really like the functionality of the wrap but the ice pack lasts about 5 min. Also, this is the second neoprene product I've bought that has an overwhelming chemical smell even after soaking in Dawn and washing I've put it outside in the sun hoping to get the smell out for the next use.
customer_reviews.author: ChocolateMaven

customer_reviews.title: Wrap is great but ice pack is poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware--the ice pack which comes with this back wrap falls out way too easily. The wrap itself is quite nice but I have to put a washcloth inside the stretch netting to keep the ice pack from just slipping right out before I can get the wrap in place! :( I have a CVS back wrap which I think is absolutely perfect in every way, but CVS doesn't offer it anymore and I figured Ace was a well-known brand so it would also be good, but am disappointed with the design!
customer_reviews.author: montana_gal

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: my husband has back pain and kidney pain daily. This works very well for him especially at work where he can wear it under his uniform
customer_reviews.author: SLI

customer_reviews.title: perfect for lumbar spine injury
customer_reviews.text: I have a lumbar spine injury and frequently have to ice my back and still have to move around. This wrap is EXACTLY what I needed! My only "complaint" is that the ice pack only stays cold for about 15 minutes (but that's all we're supposed to used it for anyway, right??) It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: GEnAP

customer_reviews.title: looks like the photo
customer_reviews.text: seeing how teenagers spend their time with back packs or at a desk, or on their phones this is anperfect reminder for your child to be mindful of posture
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: SMALL! I have a 36 inch waist and its ...
customer_reviews.text: SMALL! I have a 36 inch waist and its a squeeze to get this to stay on. I only get an inch or 2 of overlap on the band for the Velcro to fasten
customer_reviews.author: John Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing it for two days now, on and off, and I already feel like I have better posture. The only downside is, that it can be uncomfortable under the arms.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Glica

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, But Due to Size Cold is Relatively Short-Lived
customer_reviews.text: Product is cheap & comfortable (rare combination). Due to the small size of the gel-ice pack it comes with, this product is only missing the 3rd component of any great lumbar ice wrap: maintaining cold for an adequate amount of time. If you're like me and need to continually ice daily regardless (and therefore have a large revolving stock of frozen ice packs) then this is not a deal-breaker. If you're somewhat impatient about or unable to frequently swap/refreeze ice packs, look elsewhere. NOTE: You can fit a 6x10 pack in here as well.
customer_reviews.author: An Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have a lumbar spine injury and frequently have to ice my back and still have to move around. This wrap is EXACTLY what I needed! My only "complaint" is that the ice pack only stays cold for about 15 minutes (but that's all we're supposed to used it for anyway, right??) It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Melanee McKee

customer_reviews.title: It does help me with my neck problem.
customer_reviews.text: I wear it for an hour every day and I have noticeable improvement for my neck chronic pain and my posture. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Max G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works to keep cold where you want it
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is easy to get on and stays in place to keep cold right where I need it. It is comfortable to wear and have worn it in the car while driving and able to take off easily once I get to wherever I am going. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Back Wrap
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this back wrap is the inside pocket that holds the ice pack is made of super thin mesh. I have to wrap the ice pack in a towel first or it is much too cold. Also, The picture and size of the wrap is deceptive. The ice pack that comes with it is rather small and flimsy. Luckily I had one that was larger and covered more of my back.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs DBH

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.text: If there was a way to wear it without it cutting off my circulation under my arms, that would be great. If it could be made to rest against the side of my chest instead of armpits, that would solve the problem. Can't wear it for more than a few minutes because my arms go numb.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and this made my job much easier, no back pain.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Austin

customer_reviews.title: great support
customer_reviews.text: Gives great support for my lower back. I wear it when I am exercising and distance walking
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Slept like a baby!
customer_reviews.text: Throughout my thoracic & lumbar spine I have compression fractures...my back aches. At night in this cold weather I just can't seem to get comfortable. This sure did the trick last night. I read the directions carefully, put it on (& the foot warmers, too) & off I went to dreamland!!! Loving it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: like that it can be worn while still up and ...
customer_reviews.text: The wrap works very well, like that it can be worn while still up and about walking. The gel pack is not quite large enough to fill up the space for it in the wrap however. Gel measures about an inch short in width, 4.25", should be 5.25" to completely fill the space for it in the wrap, to give maximum use.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fits good either walking around doing things or sitting in a chair.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and the heat or cold gel pack fits perfectly in this around the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back wrap great for women
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these. I use them on long road trips, while sitting at my sewing machine and when working in the yard. The gel back is an added bonus for heat or cold therapy. The shape is great for ladies with the narrow front fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Product works well.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I can use the ice pack frozen. My opinion of the company ACE is not as good.
customer_reviews.author: lady

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I get a darn good workout putting this supporter on. However, once on it does help me to maintain good posture and helps to relieve some of my upper back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C Sornberger

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, stays cold!
customer_reviews.text: Great support for lower back as well. Easy to put on. Fits great under a shirt and is inconspicuous. Well made. Velcro stays put as does gel pack which I'm able to alternate with other ice packs I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Will O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for keeping ice pack on while needing to move ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice for keeping ice pack on while needing to move around the house and do other things. Kinda small pocket though and will only fit the ice pack included.
customer_reviews.author: erin0525

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Convenient, priced right. A+
customer_reviews.text: Just got it from fedex and I already love it! I wear size 36 waist and this wrap works great with room to spare. I have bad low back pain and this is so much better than having to lean against an ice pack wrapped in a towel. Great product. Definitely worth the money 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design Feature
customer_reviews.text: It's a good icepack, but there's nothing holding the icepack in its sleeve. On most icepacks, you're able to velcro the pack into the sleeve. With this wrap, it doesn't close at either end of the sleeve, so the icepack easily slides out.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Wow very nice and instant relief
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for lower back injuries. I was using a heating pad but although it provided relief it actually was counter productive since it inflamed the nerves. The gel thing it comes with is perfect and molds itself to your back. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Black

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it once and it fits and works great for me. My waist size is 31" and if you do have a large waist, this product is not for you as it will not fit your waist. I glad I bought it as I suffer from chronic back pain and with this I can walk around with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Teman99

customer_reviews.title: Great for multitasking
customer_reviews.text: I strap this around my back during my daily commute to help keep inflammation down after spine surgery. Stays in place nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christenm

customer_reviews.title: ACE Compress Back Wrap, Cold/Hot
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad wrap but the belt needs a little more length to it. It does help put cold or heat where you need it to ease those aches & pains.
customer_reviews.author: JinglepawsTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Supports proper posture without being restricting. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hatton

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my back went out. I use it with a much larger cold pack than the one it came with, since that one was too small to cover my whole lower back. This is really stretchy, so even if you are not skinny, it should fit.
customer_reviews.author: pendron

customer_reviews.title: Knee Replacement A great product for icing after Surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had a total knee replacement and have used this ice pack for 30 minutes 8-10 times per day for 6 weeks and am expecting to use if for the next surgery as well. I used the smaller pack that came with it behind my knee out of the wrap. I then placed a larger ACE ice gel pack (Ace Reusable Cold Compress, Large by ACE) on the front of my knee and strapped the whole 'sandwich' down with the blue wrap. It held everything better than everything else we tried. It has held up quite well and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Gel Pack Popped
customer_reviews.text: I feel this product is poorly made. The gel pack popped after just a few uses. This happened with two gel packs.
customer_reviews.author: Jialu Chen

customer_reviews.title: I use over and over, super portable and very durable - great after all these many months of heavy use!!!
customer_reviews.text: so convenien! I use over and over, super portable and very durable - great after all these many months of heavy use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Great for my lower back pain.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the lumbar area of my back. I use it every morning and when I have done anything that stressed my back I use it again later in the day. Great pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. The mesh holder for the gel pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. The mesh holder for the gel pack allows the pack to fall to the bottom of the belt. The lack of a Velcro closure on the mesh holder also makes it too easy for the gel pack to fall out when putting the belt on off our carrying. Simple design change would make this wrap 2 stars better.
customer_reviews.author: MrJones

customer_reviews.title: Great for low back pain
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wrap. You'll want to get a second or third gel pack to replace inside the wrap when it loses its cold.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to have around.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I waited this long to get something like this. Having back pain for years, I've always had ACE cold packs around. But never had anything to hold them in place. I have used this wrap with the cold pack that comes with it, and used the wrap as a strap to hold a larger cold pack in place. Definitely glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for minor soreness
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but the ice melts way too quickly. Nice for minor soreness and pain but not if needed for over 30 minutes. Nice quality and wearability.
customer_reviews.author: LK630

customer_reviews.title: Good wrap for Icing
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I am able to walk around with it on and get the treatment I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Elly Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to keep ice jell pack on my back as i am walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rini

customer_reviews.title: Great Back/ice wrap
customer_reviews.text: It is great compress, wish the drug store chains actually stocked it. It's a one size fits all. if you are a large person (over a 40 inch waist) it will NOT fit you.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Randle

customer_reviews.title: Back support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fits just fine and gives the support I was hoping for. Well made and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: i got this g or menstrual cramps and back pains ...
customer_reviews.text: i got this g or menstrual cramps and back pains. it doesn't hold heat long enough for my taste but its definitely gives you relief
customer_reviews.author: SweetPea

customer_reviews.title: The ACE Compress Back Wrap is great! It's really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The ACE Compress Back Wrap is great! It's really comfortable, and allows the ice pack to rest firmly against your back no matter what position you're in. The only reason it gets 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the size of the ice pack itself. I wish the ice pack was larger so that it could cover more of the back/top of the gluts.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Metchik

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ice pack stays cold only for about 20 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Azeem

customer_reviews.title: ACE Compress Back Wrap
customer_reviews.text: Like many people with lower back pain, this has come in very handy when trying to remain mobile, but also provides some extra support when sitting. I bought this a couple years ago and pull it out when needed. Excellent purchase for those random lower back flair ups.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Kurzhal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for my lower back that I could use while still doing activities. Ace products have never disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hagenwald

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these. One for the office and one at home. It fits well under your clothes as long as you are not wearing skin tight stuff and provides cold for a long time. I recommend this over most others as you can swap out the cold pack. Many of these products have the belt integrated into the pack and thus you have to freeze it for every use. This product allows you to keep extra packs in the freezer so you never have to wait for a nice coolie on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Fife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can walk around with this on!
customer_reviews.author: MBANKS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed it at the time and it was a wonderful pack. Just cool enough and comfortable to wear. Cool makes more sense than heat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fields-Kasuba

customer_reviews.title: Order incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the compress that was to come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Greene

customer_reviews.title: May be great for some - for my wife it is ok ...
customer_reviews.text: May be great for some - for my wife it is ok but not as good as a larger coverage area pack
customer_reviews.author: Dick44G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought it for the wife for her bad back, she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K. Blais

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Flexible enough to use in other areas in addition to back
customer_reviews.author: LCD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a lower back muscle strain. It fits, it's secure, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: TDM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, use it daily to ice my back. Stays in place, so I can keep active
customer_reviews.author: Flylady

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Im a skinny guy weighing about a buck 75. This thing works perfect for icing the lower back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Very good with a pocket to hold cold or hot compress or just use as a support belt.
customer_reviews.author: lrw

customer_reviews.title: Last very long
customer_reviews.text: This does the job and last for years I use mainly for cold packs. also the bags can be put in plastic bag if they start leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was as advertised but I probably won't use it much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, but make sure it did not stick to you cloth!
customer_reviews.author: Zoo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ice pack could be bigger and fill the pocket more.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur Kikani

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is great to use for aching backs. The cold pack works wonders! I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shook

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: with a bad back , this holds the ice pack/hot pack in place while at work ,home, and driving. easy to use, soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Judy Zehr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wrap after every workout and my joints and rib feel great
customer_reviews.author: MIKE DOUGLASS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it can be cold or hot. Used it both ways and works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Works great though edges of gel insert are a little sharp
customer_reviews.text: Works great though edges of gel insert are a little sharp. Worried though whether the gel insert will physically hold up and the easiest way to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: DAN M KINNEY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My back wrap did not come with the “included” gel pack.
customer_reviews.author: michael saragueta

customer_reviews.title: So Much Better than Laying On An Ice Pack
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It's true what other reviewers have said, that it might not fit everyone. I have about a 29 or 30" waist and it fits great, with a few inches to spare. It fits snuggly, so I am getting good contact even as I walk around and do things while wearing it (which may or may not be advised.) Not sure if the description says that it's blue or purple, but the one I got is blue (picture is purple.)
customer_reviews.author: Jessicabythebay

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Use it twice a day and will ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Use it twice a day and will be buying another one soon just to have as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kohn

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but the gel pack slides out of the pocket. A pocket with just an opening on the top would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for icing lower back. Need to buy extra ice packs, only 1 comes with the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very supportive
customer_reviews.text: I love the ice pack. My cousin had one that she wears all of the time. I always freeze the ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rita J. Bramlett Rn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not 5 because the ice packs slides out on the sides, overall a great product - very happy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for holding a cold pack in place for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wrap around your back and the velcro makes it stick.
customer_reviews.author: thomas ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Not cold enough, pak slips in and our of pocket
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great back brace for people who want support without inhibiting movement. You never know it is on during tennis match.
customer_reviews.author: micharl fritz

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It's helps my lower back fit good I like the comfort it give me during day plus it helps with the stress on the back. great price also
customer_reviews.author: sayles r hastings

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: these are the best, way more comfortable. buy a few and keep them in the freezer. I use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Lex Boz

customer_reviews.title: really helped with the pain. I bought another one ...
customer_reviews.text: really helped with the pain. I bought another one so I could have one in the freezer at all times.
customer_reviews.author: S Hill

customer_reviews.title: The pouch that holds the gel bag is NOT a ...
customer_reviews.text: The pouch that holds the gel bag is NOT a pouch. One end should be sewed shut to keep it from falling out. Very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Lonefeather :

customer_reviews.title: You must have a small waist to wrap this around ...
customer_reviews.text: You must have a small waist to wrap this around. Anyone overweight from 10 lbs to 50 lbs will have a problem wearing this. NOT for Chubs or the Obese. Just tiny bellies.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: but I know that it will be good. I get spinal injections and this will help ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet, but I know that it will be good. I get spinal injections and this will help me tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Kay C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - I am happy with the quality and sturdiness of this wrap. It works well also for neck, legs, arms, ankles and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Huntsman

customer_reviews.title: 5 star Compress Back Wrap, Cold/Hot, by ACE
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a LOT of back pain. So we decided to buy this product and I have to tell you that she love it!! It includes reusable hot or cold gel pack, insulating wrap material is ideal for hot or cold treatments, adjustable wrap conveniently holds gel pack in place, neoprene-blend wrap combined with hot or cold gel pack provides a therapeutic temperature during treatment and the Freeze reusable gel pack for cold therapy or microwave for heat therapy. The cool thing is that we can use it for other parts, like my shoulder and our knees. COLD and HOT... this is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TDS

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The band states "One Size Fits All". I was surprised to discover that this band is Very Small around the Waist with 2-3 inches of Leeway with the amount of extra Velcro coming up short. I consider myself a small woman @ 5'3" & under 135lbs. The photograph seems generic and may or may not be a woman. Also, the band Does Not accept the Standard Sized Therapeutic ice pack. The openings on either side fit an ice pack, by my measurement, two-thirds the standard opening. One would have to locate a smaller size ice pack not found in Medical Suppliers, at least my own doesn't carry one this small.
customer_reviews.author: Tobie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Works well as cold gel. I noticed my body temperature starts making the pack warm after awhile which is nice as well. Fits roomy, could be for a man as well. Velcro area is large for secure fit. Not bulky like some of the other back braces I have. Easily hides under a big tee shirt. :) Only downside is sometimes the pack slips out as I’m putting it on. The ends are open. Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don’t see value in this one. I dont have problems holding my shoulders straight, I wanted more of a general support of the are, which is not provided by this thing. I needed support when I sit at the computer because it’s difficult to keep the back straight for several hours, but this brace is too short and does not help keep back straight, it only holds the shoulders which is useless to me. It seems to be a quality thing it’s just that it’s not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lets me walk around while chilling my aching back. Could be a bit thicker and have more gel though.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me (Just had major back surgery). I sometimes add a stand-alone ACE cold pack under this one for extra cooling since IMO this one should be a little thicker. I like that I can walk around instead of just lying down or sitting in a chair. I used to try to wrap a regular belt around my waist to hold a cold pack on, but this one straps on with velcro and holds the cooling packs on much more effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Chang

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Injured my lower back falling on icy stairs and ended up buying this so I could keep the ice pack in place. I have a thicker waist and this was a pretty snug fit. I also found th at the holder for the ice pack pocket is open on both sides so I ended up adding some Velcro to seal it in, otherwise it's a little difficult to keep the ice pack in as you're trying to secure it on your waist. Overall this is a great product, just needs a few tweaks! It's definitely not a "one size fits all" item.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: No more horizontal restrictions when icing
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers are stating that the ice packs fall out because the mesh pocket which holds the ice pack is open on both sides...to help elevate this issue I use a 6 x 10 ice pack (see link below) and it fits snug in the wrap and doesn’t go anywhere. I actually bought two of these ACE wraps and I wear them both simultaneously and ice my entire back (Chiropractor’s orders) as I move about the house.
customer_reviews.author: AstarteQueen

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, but
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. The cold pack fits into an inside horizontal 'tube' made of an elastic material which will sag over time and allow the it to slide L or R somewhat. If you were to just sit still, no problem; but who sits still all the time? It's a good product, so what I did to make is a little better for me was to stich up one side. It might have been better if they made the pouch opening on top and use some Velcro too, and let body pressure AND gravity hold it in place. Or, just have one open end with a Velcro flap.
customer_reviews.author: Renee'

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. You don't need a second set of hands to get this just right, and it is very comfortable. The gel stays cold for about 20 minutes, which is exactly how long you should appy ice. The only thing that could improve this, if your back is hurting all the way across, would be to make one that has a pocket where you put the ice pack and the ice pack itself, long enough to cover the entire width of the back. Other than that, I's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brisco

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, careless construction
customer_reviews.text: The product arrives with a flimsy, gauze pocket for the cold/hot compress, which is made of cheap plastic. This design ensures that the compress will slip out one side or the other. The company used to make good products with a horizontal-opening pocket in a heavy black material. Nowadays, their products are weak fabrics often in this electric blue.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Oliphant

customer_reviews.title: works great for back pain and hot flashes
customer_reviews.text: This works great to hold hot or cold packs on your back for back pain or for menopause hot flashes as well. Comes with one thermal pack, I would recommend buying 2-3 more (see Nexcare Reusable Coldhot pack 4 x 10") so you can keep the hot or cold working for longer. I have only used them for cold packs, I have not tried microwaving them. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jay and Terri

product_meta.title: ACE Deluxe Back Stabilizer, with Lumbar Support, Back Brace, Firm Stability, Helps with Herniated Discs and Sciatica
product_meta.description: Style:Deluxe Back StabilizerThe ACE Deluxe back stabilizer gives you the support you need to make it comfortably through your day. A dual-strap system easily adjusts for a snug, comfortable fit, while rigid stays and a lumbar pad offer maximum lower back as well as abdominal support. This firm-stabilizing brace features perforated neoprene that releases excess heat to help keep you cool and your skin dry. Keep up with your day-to-day responsibilities and recreation with the ACE Deluxe back stabilizer.
feature_bullets: Stabilizing design offers a customizable level of support
Dual compression straps for back and abdominal support
Breathable materials enhance airflow to help keep skin dry
Rigid stays and lumber pad for added Stability
Easy to put on and adjust; fits comfortably under clothing up to 48" waist
ACE is America's most trusted brand of braces, supports and elastic bandages. Based on 2018 TNS brand health tracking of braces, supports and elastic bandages.
Supported by our expert panel of engineers and medical professionals
